verbose_text: Interestingly, as shown in Figure XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY, besides CK1gamma2, other isoforms such as CK1gamma3, CK1delta and CK1epsilon, but neither CK1alpha, CK1gamma1 nor VRK1, could also degrade IRS4, indicating that CK1 family members may have specificity for each substrate to some degree.
evidence: CK1gamma1 nor VRK1, could also degrade IRS4
